main_definition: Hockey is a team sport played on ice (ice hockey) or hard surface (field hockey), where two teams try to score goals by hitting a puck/ball with sticks, and the object of the game can vary based on the type of hockey.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A slang term used to refer to someone or something that is considered clumsy or awkward
meanings_and_examples.example: He's such a hockey when he tries to dance, always tripping over his own feet.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The act of playing the game of ice hockey
meanings_and_examples.example: They spent their Saturday afternoon at the rink, just enjoying some hockey with friends.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A phrase referring to a difficult or challenging situation
meanings_and_examples.example: Trying to finish this project on time is like playing hockey without skates; it's really tough!
